Contrary Research – Analysis on scaling SaaS from $1M to $100M ARR

credibility_indicators: Founder of a venture-backed AI company (TextQL)
Backed by well-known VCs like Neo, DCM, Worklife
Background with top-tier VC firms (Bessemer, Contrary)
potential_red_flags: TextQL is in a competitive AI/analytics automation market, with risk of overlap against incumbents like dbt, Snowflake ecosystem tools, or emerging AI data copilots.
Playful/irreverent communication style may not resonate in more traditional enterprise contexts.
person_analysis.overview: Ethan Ding is the Co-Founder & CEO of TextQL, a venture-backed startup automating data science through SQL and Python agents for dashboards and warehouses. Previously, he worked in venture research and investing at Bessemer Venture Partners and Contrary, publishing playbooks on scaling SaaS companies. With 10,000+ LinkedIn followers, Ethan has a strong public presence as both founder and thought leader in data infrastructure and AI.
person_analysis.executive_summary: Ethan Ding blends founder experience and venture capital expertise. As CEO of TextQL, he is pioneering data science automation backed by top investors, while his background at Bessemer and Contrary gives him a deep perspective on SaaS growth and enterprise analytics. His combination of operator and investor experience positions him as a rising founder in AI/data automation.
key_insights: Has unique dual background as both VC (Bessemer, Contrary) and founder (TextQL).
Actively building in the AI x data infrastructure space with strong early traction.
Well-networked with both investors and operators; highly visible online.
Playful, irreverent brand voice distinguishes him from more buttoned-up founders.
